localize.title: Buzzing on Youtube
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Youtube in your native language

blogPost.excerpt:
TommyInnit & Tubbo watch his old, unseen Minecraft videos. This was insane. 

Follow my Twitter - @tommyinnit

Follow my Instagram - @tommyinnitt

Edited by Tommy + Big Man Editor Larry ( @TalentLacking )

This is my Second Channel where I post extra content & videos that I love making but wouldn't be as awesome, cool or funny on the TommyInnit channel! There is still some Dream SMP Minecraft & some of The Funniest Minecraft Videos Ever... and even some vlogs like the time I met Wilbur Soot in real life... it is awesome & I have lots of laughs! I am not crazy
blogPost.body:

I am not crazy
blogPost.title: Watching my old videos.
blogPost.author: TommyOutit

previous.excerpt:
With each breath we have the opportunity to begin again, to arrive in the present moment. In this foundational phase of this journey I invite you to see each new practice as a new arrival.

Accept and celebrate that each day will be different. Some days you will have more energy than others. Some days it will seem as though the universe is supporting you to show up, eagerly, and fully. Some days your brain will* make it very hard for you to arrive, and it may seem like the exterior is winning over your interior goals. 

Make your #1 goal to show up on the mat. 

Self care is learning the practice of meeting your self each day, learning about who you really are, and continuing to arrive to devote to the process of self discovery, not perfectionism. 

With each breath, a new arrival. 

Itâ€™s a powerful tool, and one we are going to cultivate and celebrate together. 

Let me know how Day 2 goes for you in the comment section down below!

- - - - - - - - - - 

â¤ï¸SUBSCRIBE to the YWA channel for free yoga videos every week and to support high-quality free yoga for all! â¤ï¸
https://www.youtube.com/user/yogawithadriene?sub_confirmation=1

- - - - - - - - - -

next.excerpt:
Uncle Roger 3M egg fried rice reveal! This weejio spoonsored by SASA, Uncle Roger's favourite MSG brand.

This weejio using the last stock of Sasa MSG that Uncle Roger have ğŸ˜”

Dear SASA team, please send Uncle Roger your new MSG. I hear you have new packaging coming up very soon! Uncle Roger canâ€™t wait to have my salt on crack. Happy new year 2021!

Go check out SASA Instagram @sasamelezatkan and for more recipes @micinsosialgang

And go visit Mei Mei if you're in London: https://instagram.com/meimeilondon

0:00 Intro
1:28 Prep
5:43 Cook
8:59 Taste test
10:05 Michelin Star version
12:17 Outro

--

Uncle Roger egg fried rice recipe:

Ingredient (no quantity listed, just use feeling):
Garlic
Shallot
Egg
Spring onion
Chilli
Chicken rice
Soy sauce
Asian sesame oil
Pork lard OR peanut oil (or vegetable oil if you weak)
White pepper (optional)
and of course... MSG
AND NO VEGETABLE. Vegetable taste like sad.

Steps:
Oil the wok with pork lard/peanut oil/vegetable oil
Fry garlic and shallot until fragrant
Add egg, fry until fluffy
Add rice. Stir
Add soy sauce, sesame oil, MSG, white pepper. Stir
Add spring onion, chilli
TOSS
Enjoy your egg fry rice while judging Jamie Oliver

Thank you for 3 million subscriber. BAI BAI!

---
